name: cows_and_bulls
description: Cows and bulls on Ethereum with Noir zero-knowledge proofs

scripts.zk:verifier: cd circuits && bb write_vk -b ./target/cows_and_bulls.json -o ./target -t evm && bb write_solidity_verifier -k ./target/vk -o ./target/Verifier.sol
scripts.foundry:createNewGame: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source .env && forge script script/createNewGame.s.sol:CreateNewGameScript --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key $MAKER_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast
scripts.tool:hash: cd circuits && nargo execute tmp --prover-name ../Game.toml && rm -rf circuits/target/tmp.gz
